outputs.output_descr:
The purpose of this project is to produce the Egypt National Human Development Report. The project will contribute to enhanced human development in Egypt, by providing continued examination of priority national development themes, emerging trends, opportunities and challenges that are people-centered, including identifying disadvantaged groups of population using spatial, gender and other forms of disaggregation. Egypt NHDR will also promote policy dialogue at the national level, constructive expression of divergent views and the identification and analysis of development alternatives to impact poverty reduction. The most recent reports include:
- 2005 NHDR on new social contract
- 2008 NHDR on Civil Society Organizations within the new social contract 
- 2010 NHDR on Youth in Egypt

project_descr: The National Human Dev. Report project facilitates the production of almost bi-annual human development reports under different themes and with the participation of the releveant national stakeholders.
